title: Flight Simulator 2020   Addon spotlight   PMDG DC6   new liveries
description:
PMDG has released updates for 4 of their DC6A liveries and 2 new liveries for their DC6. It is not the first time this happens and it looks like PMDG keeps on improving both the aircraft itself but also the liveries. We will look at how to update the liveries and how the install the 2 new added ones using the PMDG Operations Center

If you also want to give the aircraft a try you can download it from the site below:
https://pmdg.com/pmdg-dc-6-for-msfs/
